text: Ito Curata (2 November 1959 â€“ 26 March 2020) was a Filipino fashion designer. He worked creating bridal gowns and Filipiniana clothing. His well known clients were Hollywood actress Sharon Stone, former Philippine president Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, and Filipino actress Bea Alonzo. He was born in Manila. He and his partner Miller were hospitalized in mid march due to COVID-19 symptoms in Manila. Curata died on March 26, 2020 due to pneumonia caused by the infection, aged 60. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Businesspeople from Manila Category:Fashion designers Category:LGBT fashion designers Category:Gay men Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Manila Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Ito Curata
